item.title: [DISTRELEC-6785] DE - creditcard orders
item.description: Creditcard-order is issued, order-confirmation page is shown with order-number(1000100995) but according to finance the money is not booked from the card.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Attached ScreenShot from HMC :- Here we can see we have received A successful response from Evo Payment.

comments.comment:
Hi Sarah,

I updated the google spreadsheet with the newest properties for translation.

BR, Nabil.

Hey Rafael
Last year we talked about changing the process so that you ask Sam directly for translations. How do we proceed here?
Thanks, Sarah

Hello Rafi,

sam
translations already imported, waiting for the rest.
Samuel, Please attach the rest of the translations.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6806] Weitere Infos zum Problem Detailseite
item.description:
Ich suchte heute Morgen für einen Kunden eine HDD als ich dann in die Detailansicht wollte landete ich wieder auf der Startseite.

Steps to reproduce 1:

  1. Computer & Hobby
  2. Computer und PC-Komponenten
  3. Festplatten / SSD /Ram
  4. Interne Festplatten
  5. Filtern nach 500GB; 3.5“; SATA 3Gb/s
  6. Und dann den Artikel 168266 angeklickt

Steps to reproduce 2:

  1. Computer & Hobby
  2. Computer und PC-Komponenten
  3. Mainboard / CPU / Kühler
  4. Und dann den Artikel 160225 angeklickt

At Automation and at Printers it seems to work..

Claude Müller
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[1] claude.mueller@distrelec.com
[Created via e-mail received from: "Mueller, Claude" <claude.mueller@distrelec.com>]

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Hallo Will, bitte David heute noch Bescheid geben, wieso dies passiert. Ich denke es ist ein SEO redirection problem.

Hi Rafael

This is the product url:
http://www.distrelec.ch/de/Harddisk-3-5%22-SATA-3-Gb-s-500-GBRPM16-MB-Western-Digital-WD5000AVCS/p/11067165

When I opened it, I saw the following error:

06 May 2015 13:32:17 ERROR [hybrisHTTP16] [10.191.16.11] [error_page_log] a technical error occured [uuid: 971035e8-6dcb-4544-a4c8-b01618675315], IP Address: 10.191.16.11. Current customer has no permission to buy or see this product, because the product is not buyable for the current sales organisation or a punchout applies.

Then I checked the stock level for this product, which is currently 0 for switzerland. I think this is the problem. Check my attached screenshot.

Cheers
Will

Hi David

There are some country punchouts for this product. This is the problem. The punchouts are created yesterday 05.05.2015 09:12.

Can I delete them in hybris?

The punchouts need also to be deleted in the ERP.

Cheers
Will

http://www.distrelec.ch/de/Harddisk-3-5%22-SATA-3-Gb-s-500-GBRPM16-MB-Western-Digital-WD5000AVCS/p/11067165

The product is now buyable in switzerland and liechtenstein. I deactivated the punchout in hybris P. Raphael Leu will update the ERP accordingly.

Cheers
Will

hi will,

I still can't Access 160225, could you please check.

Note that the last Stibo Import was from end of January and it could have an Impact but please make sure that we don't have more issues. Thanks.

Hi David

You can now access this product: http://www.distrelec.ch/de/Intel-Server-Board-S2600COE---Motherboard---SSI-EEB---LGA2011-Socket---C600-A-LGA2011-Intel-C600-A-Intel-DBS2600COE/p/11025747

Cheers
Will
was it again a punchout?
Yes the problem was a country punchout.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6766] SHOPPROBLEME !! aktualisiert die Filterwahl nicht!
item.description:
Issue in IE: After every filter-selection the page has to be reloaded in order to apply the filter.

Original message
Nach jeder Filteranwahl bleibt der Shop hängen!
(Man muss nach jeder Filteranwahl „manuell“ F5 drücken)
Da das unsere Kunden nicht wissen – können sie die Filter nicht brauchen… sind hilflos, können nicht bestellen! 

[1]http://www.distrelec.ch/search?q=Patchkabel+LWL&filter_Category3=Netzwerkkabel+%2F+Installationsmaterial&filter_Seite+A=ST&filter_Seite+A=LC&filter_Seite+B=ST&filter_L%C3%A4nge%7E%7Emm=10000&filter_Fasertyp=50%2F125%C2%B5m+OM3&page=1&pageSize=10&lang=de

Beat Eugster
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[1] http://www.distrelec.ch/search?q=Patchkabel+LWL&filter_Category3=Netzwerkkabel+%2F+Installationsmaterial&filter_Seite+A=ST&filter_Seite+A=LC&filter_Seite+B=ST&filter_L%C3%A4nge%7E%7Emm=10000&filter_Fasertyp=50%2F125%C2%B5m+OM3&page=1&pageSize=10&lang=de

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Problem exists with IE. Other browsers (Chrome, Firefox) are working fine.
BR, Patrick
Please have a look, thx.

Ruben, please check. Thx
/Nabil.
Hi Ruben, treat this as the priority.
Please test after the next deployment
How many customers are impacted? all IE? can we do a hotfix for that begining of next week?
This should be commited to the hotfix-version v3.3.4

As discussed,
this change is already present in branch v3.3

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6542] OCI // HTML Encoding is not working
item.description:
The HTML encoding functionality is not working.
If I try to set the HTML encoding to Yes or No it won't work properly.

Try with: https://www.distrelec.ch/ociEntry?username=hilti-ch-ger@oci.distrelec&password=dlALpfEL&oci_version=4.0&hook_url=http://q08.elfa.se:50000/elfa3/catalogdb/DisplayParametersServlet
item.summary: OCI // HTML Encoding is not working

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: The text you received is from the ELFA servlet not from the webshop. From the webshop you get the encoded text which is sent to the ELFA servlet.
Ok, what should i answer Hilti?
Internal note: Servlet should be implemented on Q/P which can be used for OCI testing.
Hi Nabil, Could you give me an update here? What's the status?
No news here, you just assigned me the ticket which means that I will start working on it now.

I created the Servlet for OCI testing. The new hook URL is now

  • Production :http://www.distrelec.ch/DisplayOCIParameters (not yet deployed)
  • Test: http://test.distrelec.ch/DisplayOCIParameters (not yet deployed)

Please have a look at my screenshot. I received this after ordering with the followin URL: http://www.distrelec.de/ociEntry?username=distrelec-test-de-ger@oci.distrelec&password=test456&oci_version=4.0&hook_url=http://test.distrelec.ch/DisplayOCIParameters

Please double-check if this is the desired outcome?
Ask Oliver Sautter
Hi Oliver, please let us know if this is the correct outcome? Thx.

The function "Encode HTML" is still not working properly. I checked both settings in HMC. See picture one. Both outputs are the same now "ü"

I explained it to Rafael please both take a look.
Please test again after next deployment on Q.
Form automatically send only if parameter sendForm = true

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6484] All ELFA Q & P sites// Evo Payment configurations //Capture Pay SSL = AUTO becomes Capture Pay SSL = MANUAL
item.description:
The requirement from the Webshop side is that the message [1]https://spg.evopayments.eu/pay/payssl.aspx that they send has currently Capture Pay SSL = AUTO

This has to be changed to Capture Pay SSL = MANUAL.


Action point before set live: -
For paypal payment when you change capture=manual, then it is mandatory to add <Txtype> parameter. Hence this add as a action point to configure the paypal MID to support
this additional parameter. Otherwise payment will be decline.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[1] https://spg.evopayments.eu/pay/payssl.aspx
item.summary: All ELFA Q & P sites// Evo Payment configurations //Capture Pay SSL = AUTO becomes Capture Pay SSL = MANUAL

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Hi Oana,
Please give us more information for this task.

request from business to capture sums at Evo payments only when the bills are being created.

This led to a CR at SAP end.

This leads to this change in the shop.

Hi Oana,

I understood your point that you want to change parameter Capture= AUTO to MANUAL.
But here I have a question. Do you want to change it for all kind of payment using EvoPayment ?. Like creditCardPayment / directDebit / PayPalPayment

creditCardPayment / PayPalPayment

In case of PayPal please keep in mind that the additional parameter <Txtype> becomes mandatory when setting parameter capture to MANUAL through URL "https://spg.evopayments.eu/pay/paypal.aspx.".
Dona all changes
Reverted back all the changes
Verified on P, changes are reverted.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6067] Doubled units and missing technical data
item.description:
We get double units and missing technical data for some of our products (detected in CH-DE so far):

http://www.distrelec.ch/search?q=diode

http://www.distrelec.ch/de/Komponenten/Aktive-Bauelemente/Diskrete-Halbleiter-R%C3%B6hren/Dioden/Diodennetzwerke/Diodennetzwerke%2C-Single-In-Line/c/cat-DC-71109

Please check the import & display.
item.summary: Doubled units and missing technical data

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: SEM impact : if this issue is spreading, it will dramatically impact the advertising campaign using the search.

This ticket has been solved in two steps:

  • first step we have quick fixed using an update sql query on the production db at runtime. This has removed the unnecessary units.
  • second step we have fixed the pim import.

The pim import must be tested in Q.

What's the status here? I just checked with a PM and there seems no improvement, neither on P nor on Q

(cf http://www.distrelec.ch/de/Datenkabel-geschirmt-3-0-24-mm%C2%B2-Habia-M-E-2419-STK-3/p/15546619?q=*&filter_Buyable=1&filter_Category4=Signal-+und+Datenkabel&filter_Category3=Netzwerkkabel+%2F+Steuerkabel+%2F+Datenkabel+%2F+LWL-Kabel&page=5&origPageSize=10&simi=99.3 / http://test.distrelec.ch/de/Datenkabel-geschirmt-4-0-24-mm%C2%B2-Habia-M-E-2419-STK-4/p/15546627?q=*&filter_Buyable=1&filter_Category4=Signal-+und+Datenkabel&filter_Category3=Netzwerkkabel+%2F+Steuerkabel+%2F+Datenkabel+%2F+LWL-Kabel&page=5&origPageSize=10&simi=99.3)
The issue DISTRELEC-6092 is about the same topic

Hi Daniela
We are on it with the highest priority.

It's also the case for CH-FR, AT-DE, DE-DE and RO-RO - I assume it comes with the data imports.
And Italy has a mixture of good data and Values without any units (e.g. http://www.distrelec.it/it/Diodi-di-protezione-SC-70-6%2C-5-V-W%C3%BCrth-Elektronik-82402375/p/11064102?mainId=11064103 - tensione breakdown/capacità, etc)

This issue is definitely a blocker, already 19 days and it is getting worst. Products without technical details are a complete conversion killer, many products and components will never be purchased if the specs are not available and only current customers with known part-numbers would be able to make repeated purchases, for all new customers and/or new product searches the current web is a complete disaster.

The issue with the missing attribute values has been solved.
At the moment the PIM import is running and the value of the missing attributes is being restored.

We have also fixed the issue with duplicated units, but for this we're still in the test environment.
For this we don't need to perform an additional pim import, but we can fix with a specific SQL Update statement.

Hi Francesco

The issue starts again now in RO and SK. Maybe others will follow...

/Daniela

Hi Daniela

The imports are not done there.
It is still the same issue.

Masterimport (DE) is completed.
Please check and close if ok.

Hi Florian

It looks pretty ok to me. The "only" thing is that some still miss the units. It seems to be all the attributes with the type "numeric text" in PIM (step://attributegroup?versionid=trendsVersionCHD&id=00230_numtext&editor=AttributeGroup&workspaceid=Main&contextid=CH-ger-Dis). A few examples are attached as screenshots.

/Daniela

Hi Daniela

Could you pls give me some examples with the product nr. ?

Thx
Will
Status?

Today, we discovered in CH-DE/DE-DE again doubled units: http://www.distrelec.ch/de/Komponenten/Passive-Bauelemente/Kondensatoren/Keramikkondensatoren/Vielschichtkondensatoren%2C-SMD/Chip-Keramikkondensatoren-0402/c/cat-189254

/Daniela
I checked the FF export file on Q. The values are exported correctly. I need to debug the request to figure out what exactly the problem is here.
Blocked until the testing of Ticket DISTRELEC-6524 is done.

http://test.distrelec.ch/de/Komponenten/Passive-Bauelemente/Kondensatoren/Keramikkondensatoren/Vielschichtkondensatoren%2C-SMD/Chip-Keramikkondensatoren-0402/c/cat-189254#

filters are comming now also with double units. i can go on.
bug is fixed and committed to trunk & v3.3 branch. Can be tested after the next Q deployment. Will be part of the P hotfix tonight.

Hi Daniela

The Q deployment is done. I retested it on Q. Its working correctly now.

Cheers
Will
